nodes.text: Trix-Tala was a Human female merchant on Balmorra during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

Trix-Tala appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Modification Commendations Vendor for Republic players on Balmorra. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on November 20, 2015, Trix-Tala was removed from the game along with the rest of the Modification Commendations Vendors.
